lead_paragraph: The United States earned a crucial 4-0 win over Guatemala on Tuesday that saved their 2018 World Cup qualifying campaign and took some pressure off coach Jurgen Klinsmann.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Grab Key Win Over Guatemala
headline.main: U.S. Grab Key Win Over Guatemala

snippet: The United States earned a crucial 4-0 win over Guatemala on Tuesday that saved their 2018 World Cup qualifying campaign and took some pressure off coach Jurgen Klinsmann....
